description: A Masters Degree, which falls into Postgraduate study is a one year qualification which is completed after a Level 6 Qualification has been gained. Upon successful completion of a MSc Degree or MBA, you will be able to go on and study for a PhD. At Regent College London, we offer a range of Masters Degree courses. Why Study a Masters Degree? By studying for a Masters Degree, you will gain a Level 7 Qualification and gain expert knowledge in your subject area, it will also allow you to accelerate your career and make personal developments. At Regent College London, we have highly experienced tutors whom are always on hand to provide you with a high standard of teaching, whilst assisting you with any queries you may have. After gaining a Masters Degree, you can look to further enhance your knowledge by completing a PhD in a subject area of your interest. Who is a Masters Degree for? Studying for a Masters Degree can provide you with many different benefits and will allow you to explore different interests within your chosen subject area. Our Masters Degrees are designed to help you gain a deeper and stronger level of understanding of you are your subject area. The MSc Degrees and the MBA involve a mixture of theoretical and practical learning methods. Many students work whilst completing their Masters Degree, which is why we offer flexible timetables. We run classes in the Weekday, Evenings and even Weekends, this allows students to fit in their studies around any life commitments. What subjects can I study with a Masters Degree? At Regent College London, we offer a MSc International Management, MSc Accountancy and Financial Management and Master of Business Administration that is validated by the University of Bolton. How are Students assessed in a Masters Degree? Each course subject has different means of assessments, please refer to the course page itself to see how students are assessed. Am I able to apply for Student Finance with this Degree? Yes, you care able to apply for Student Finance. We have a specialist and dedicated Student Finance team, who are highly qualified in helping you through the entire Student Finance Process. When and how can I apply? Our enrolment process is easy and hassle free! Apply today to join the Regent College London campus with locations in Central London, Harrow, Kingsbury, Southall and Wembley. Enquire about a course and a member of the team will be in touch soon. Don’t wait any further, take the next step in your career today!
